item.title: Phoenix LiveView Anti Patterns
item.description: Let’s make some common mistakes and see how to fix them Do not operate on the socket in LiveViews or LiveComponents The concern of a LiveView and LiveComponent is the socket’s assigns - not the socket itself. Never pass around the socket struct in LiveViews and LiveComponents. What ends up happening, inevitably, is the method that receives the socket pattern matches on the assigns of the received socket argument. This is bad for a couple of reasons:
